TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A tunable that represents a sim competition. Contains all the relevant information for a single competition.

TdescFragTag.name: availability_tests
TdescFragTag.description: The tests that determine if this competition is available. Should include both general availability and competitor specific availability.

Tunable.name: competition_description
Tunable.description: The description of this competition.

TunableVariant.name: competition_situation
TunableVariant.description: The situation to put sims in when they are in the competition.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The situation to put sims in when they are in the competition.

TunableList.name: competition_start_loot_actions
TunableList.description: A list of loot actions to apply to the sim that is participating in a competition when the competition starts.

Tunable.description: A loot actions instance to apply to the sim when the competition starts.

Tunable.name: cropped_hero_image
Tunable.description: A cropped version of the hero image.

Tunable.name: entry_fee
Tunable.description: The fee that must be paid to enter the competition.

Tunable.name: hero_image
Tunable.description: The hero image (larger image) used for this competition.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon used to represent this competition.

TunableList.name: placements
TunableList.description: A list of all the possible placements the competitors can get, in descending order. Should include non-placement. Needs to have as many placements as the tournament has rounds plus one.

TunableTuple.description: A single placement in the competition.

Tunable.name: associated_sim_trait
Tunable.description: The trait that, if present on the sim, indicates that the sim has earned this placement before. NOTE: this does NOT give the sim the trait, it only looks for this trait when loading the sim's data.

Tunable.name: frame_name
Tunable.description: The frame label (NOT number) from the UI .fla file(s) that we want to use for this placement. Determines various colors, effects, etc.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: large_icon
Tunable.description: A large version of the icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: loots
TunableList.description: The loots that will be rewarded alongside the simoleon amount.

Tunable.description: A loot that will be rewarded.

Tunable.name: medal_name
Tunable.description: The name we will use for the medal itself, including the word 'medal'. For example, 'Gold Medal', or 'No Medal'.

Tunable.name: name
Tunable.description: The name of this placement.

Tunable.name: narrative_description
Tunable.description: The description of this placement, used in the results screen.

Tunable.name: results_title_text
Tunable.description: The text we will use in the results screen when we get this placement. For example, 'First Place!', or 'Try Again!'.

Tunable.name: simoleon_amount
Tunable.description: The simoleon amount given when earning this reward. Note: this amount does NOT need to be tuned in the loot in order to be given.

TdescFragTag.name: prerequisite_tests
TdescFragTag.description: The tests to determine if the given participants have met all of the prerequisites, such as completing other competitions.

Tunable.name: show_title
Tunable.description: Do we want to display the title for this competition?

TunableList.name: sim_skill_requirements
TunableList.description: A list of all skill requirements recommended for the sim entering this competition.

TunableTuple.description: A single skill requirement for the competition.

Tunable.name: recommended_level
Tunable.description: The recommended level of specified skill for the competitor.

Tunable.name: skill
Tunable.description: The skill this requirement checks against.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title of this competition.
